definition: to be infertile/to have no offspring
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: In the street corner also presented the treatment sterile sterile adlet which blots out the sky.
sentences.chinese: 街頭上也出現了鋪天蓋地的治療不孕不育的小廣告。

sentences.english: Fertile spikelets accompanied by pectinate sterile spikelets.
sentences.chinese: 可育小穗伴隨着櫛狀不育的小穗。

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the correlation of Ureaplasma urealyticum(Uu) and Chlamydia trachomatis(Ct) infections with male sterility.
sentences.chinese: 目的尋找診斷特發性男性不育的生物標記分子。

sentences.english: All the P(T)GMS have higher wrapround spikelet rates and relatively lower indehiscent spikelet rates.
sentences.chinese: 參試不育系包頸率都較高，而閉穎率相對較低。

sentences.english: The "No. 117A" is controled by two pairs overlapping recessive genes in all ready alike functions.
sentences.chinese: 它的不育性是受兩對具有相同作用的重疊性基因控制。

sentences.english: The restoring sources of "No. 117A" are wide and it is easy for transbreeding new sterility lines.
sentences.chinese: 此種材料恢復源廣，轉育新的不育系也較容易。

sentences.english: The two traits of the male sterility and brown paddy hull are inherited independently.
sentences.chinese: 雄性不育性與褐色穎殼兩個性狀屬獨立遺傳。

sentences.english: Male infertility is often the result of poorly moving sperm, called low motility.
sentences.chinese: 男性不育常常是因爲精子活力低，即“弱精”。

sentences.english: Occasionally the condition results in pain, shrinkage, or fertility problems.
sentences.chinese: 通常，這種疾病導致疼痛，睾丸萎縮，和不育問題。

sentences.english: The female sterile clone 28 is aborted because of the failure development in the female gametophyte.
sentences.chinese: 油松28號不育系是因雌配子體發育停滯所致。
易位雜合體是半不育的。

sentences.english: Its sterility was controlled by a recessive genic gene.
sentences.chinese: 其不育性由一對隱性核基因控制。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the short-term state of Toxoplasma gondii in infertile patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討不孕不育人羣弓形蟲近期感染情況。

sentences.english: A male sterile maize plant produced by the method of claim 9.
sentences.chinese: 用權力要求9的方法產生的雄性不育玉米植株。

sentences.english: The article suns up the theories and hypothesis about genetic type of male sterile.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了目前有關植物雄性不育遺傳類型的學說和假說。

sentences.english: Cytological observation of cytoplasmic male- sterile anther of brown cotton.
sentences.chinese: 棕色棉細胞質雄性不育花葯的細胞學觀察。

definition: to have a miscarriage/miscarriage/to fail/to fall through
to bear/to give birth/to grow/to rear/to bring up (children)/fertility
